channel.title: rambling on home
channel.description: Recent content in rambling on home

item.title: First post!
item.description: This wet-lab researcher built a website! With the help of some computational friends, of course. I spent a good chunk of my evenings the past few days learning html and markdown syntax, all because I don’t want to give my money to Big Server like Squarespace. On a bit more serious note, I wanted to make a website because I felt like I didn’t know what life was really like as a PhD student until I met some students during my interview weekends at grad schools.
